Content:
Hi all, sorry for a second post in quick succession
I have removed the fuel plate/filter/pump/sender assembly from the tank as the bike is 29 yrs old so thought I would replace the
internal fuel lines as I know these go brittle in time.
Come to replace the assembly, and the fuel pump seems to have packed in along with the float sender.
I assume, if you connect the battery directly tot he power terminal on the pump, while its out of the tank,
the pump should fire up
Mine doesn't so I'm thinking its screwed?
Title: BMW R850R Fuel Pump
Author: RevdRuss
